I am able to bring new ideas to the table based on my expertise and experience. I am always keeping the importance of security in mind to make sure the product is secure and safe.
users.display_body:
Web and Database Computing (Grade: D)

  • Understood the interaction between the client-side and server-side components of a web application.
  • Developed user-friendly websites across the full stack from implementing the front-end user interface (HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, VUE, Node.js) to server-side logic and database management(MySQL).
  • Designed and built AJAX calls to the server and handle responses.
